dcterms:creator: J. W. Gjerloev
dcterms:description: SuperMAG is an association of organizations that operates more than 300 ground-based magnetometers. Their objective is to perform baseline removal from the collected data and disperse them for the wider scientific community.
dcterms:title: SuperMAG

dcterms:description: The SWUG magnetometer is part of a collaboration between the University of New Hampshire and Northern New England high schools to assemble and deploy '3-Axis Simple Aurora Monitor (SAM-III)' fluxgate magnetometers, aimed at collecting geomagnetic data to study the impact of geomagnetic disturbances and induced currents.
dcterms:title: SWUG magnetometer
